metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for software development teams

plugins.name: audit-trail
plugins.description: Logs every Claude Code tool call (input and output) to JSON files in ~/.claude/logs/ for auditability and debugging

plugins.name: notifications
plugins.description: System notifications when Claude completes tasks or needs your attention (macOS + Slack)

plugins.name: dev-workflow
plugins.description: Role-based development workflow subagents with pluggable PM and notes adapters

plugins.name: guardrails-git
plugins.description: Git and GitHub safety guards: branch protection, commit boilerplate blocking, PR boilerplate blocking, timeout enforcement for git/gh commands

plugins.name: guardrails-bash
plugins.description: Bash and shell safety guards: blocks rm -rf, /tmp usage, cat/echo file writes, cd outside repo, and unsafe gradle commands

plugins.name: guardrails-docker
plugins.description: Docker safety guards: enforces timeout on docker build commands

plugins.name: guardrails-xcode
plugins.description: Xcode safety guards: enforces timeout on xcodebuild commands
